about_the_game:
A relaxing real-time idle village-building simulator nestled in the corner of your screen! Farm, smith, and craft to guide your village from humble beginnings to a thriving trading hub, it's time to write your own Village Tale!

  • Build and Expand Your Village:

    Create the village of your dreams by constructing homes, unlocking new industries, and growing your village population into a thriving happy community.

  • Relaxed and Accessible Gameplay:

    Village Tale fits into your life with idle mechanics that let your village grow even when you’re not actively playing. Always on your screen, it’s easy to check in and make decisions whenever you like.

  • Fulfill Orders and Build Relationships:

    Accept orders from neighboring colonies, fulfill their requests, and maintain strong relationships to boost your village’s prosperity and reputation.

  • Customize Everything:

    Personalize your village with various customization options, from building designs to settler appearances.

  • Strategic Village Growth:

    Plan your village’s layout and upgrades carefully to maximize its efficiency.

Take a break, settle in, and build the village of your dreams.



Features:

🕛 Real-time Gameplay that flows continuously like an ant farm.

🔨 Expand and customize your village infinitely for tens of hours.

🧠 Optimize your building placement for better production and trading

😊 Raise the happiness of your population and create the best village in the region

🖥️ Set on quietly your Desktop while you go about your life.

❤️ Establish and enhance relationships and trading routes with other regions.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent, Integrated cards also work
